                          org.springframework.data.neo4j.server.ProvidedClassPathXmlApplicationContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanFactory, BeanNameAware, DisposableBean, HierarchicalBeanFactory, InitializingBean, ListableBeanFactory, ApplicationContext, ApplicationEventPublisher, ConfigurableApplicationContext, Lifecycle, MessageSource, ResourceLoader, ResourcePatternResolver
public class ProvidedClassPathXmlApplicationContext
extends ClassPathXmlApplicationContext

Context that merges the provided graph database service with the given context locations, so that spring beans that consume a graph database are populated properly.
